meanings.definition: The act of fitting together the pieces of a jigsaw puzzle.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the jigsawing of the puzzle, finding the right spot for each piece.
meanings.sent2: Completing a jigsaw puzzle involves careful jigsawing to create the full picture.
meanings.sent3: The jigsawing of the puzzle pieces was so satisfying when they finally fit perfectly.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt like a jigsawing puzzle, trying to piece together memories from the past.
meanings.sent5: The sound of jigsawing puzzle pieces coming together brought a sense of accomplishment.

meanings.definition: The process of cutting intricate shapes or patterns using a jigsaw tool.
meanings.sent1: He demonstrated the jigsawing of the wood to create a beautiful design.
meanings.sent2: The artist used precise jigsawing to craft detailed wooden ornaments.
meanings.sent3: The jigsawing of the shapes seemed like a dance of precision and creativity.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like the jigsawing of a master craftsman, shaping ideas into reality.
meanings.sent5: The jigsawing of the jigsaw tool made the woodworking project come to life.
